head.title: COUNTY AND POWER AUTHORITY REACH ACCORD

hedline.hl1: COUNTY AND POWER AUTHORITY REACH ACCORD

abstract.p: New York Power Authority, reaching agreement with Westchester County on issues related to sale of Indian Point 3 to Entergy Corp, promises to pass on more than $1.2 million in energy savings to county, reduce energy costs to more than 100 schools, towns and government agencies and to work with county in correcting safety- and environment-related concerns (S)

block.p: The county has reached agreement with the New York Power Authority on issues related to the sale of Indian Point 3 to the New Orleans-based Entergy Corporation. The authority has promised to pass on more than $1.2 million in energy savings to the county as well as to reduce energy costs for the more than 100 schools, towns and other government agencies that buy power from the authority. Entergy has also agreed to work with the county to correct problems that have been raised about safety, environmental concerns and other plant issues.
